Method Detail

getDefaultCompareMethod

public static Method getDefaultCompareMethod(Class clazz)
Returns the comparison method for the specified class. If a comparison method has not been registered for the specified class, a search is performed up the heirachy tree. If no method is found, null is returned.

setDefaultCompareMethod

public static void setDefaultCompareMethod(Class clazz,
                                           Method compareMethod)
Sets the comparison method for the given class. The comparison method must be both static and public, and take two parameters of the type clazz.
